Steps.Message: Is your power back on? We keep texting those signed up and will do until the final 4 customers are restored. WANT TO STOP MESSAGES? You will need to text CANCEL to 80876 to stop receiving texts (standard text fees apply). Thank you.

We became aware of a power cut at 06:29. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Logs.Comment: Is your power back on? We keep texting those signed up and will do until the final 4 customers are restored. WANT TO STOP MESSAGES? You will need to text CANCEL to 80876 to stop receiving texts (standard text fees apply). Thank you.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on an underground electricity cable affecting the local area.
